Text:
Direct download for this movie: http://www.filestube.com/search.html?q=Kitaro.2007.DVDRip.XviD-SUPERiER&select=All&hosting=3 . 

Links from FilesTube media search engine. Movie divided in 16 parts of 100 mb each.

Yo, does anyone have the full copy of this movie? I've also been stuck at 59.6% for a couple of months now!

If any of you happen to have a few seeds lying about please feel free to chuck them in my general direction (animangavideo, as the uploader of this, I'm probably looking at you). I'll be able to seed for a few months after that. Thanks!

P.s. timepink, a direct download link for this version of the movie would actually be more helpful. Hardsubs beat out poorly timed srts anyday.
I'm back seeding again guys. Will keep this running for 90 days. Seed long, and prosper!
